org.bonitasoft.engine.platform

Enum PlatformState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PlatformState>
      • org.bonitasoft.engine.platform.PlatformState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<PlatformState>

    public enum PlatformState
extends Enum<PlatformState>
    Describes the possible states of the Platform.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      STARTED
      The Platform is started: - Services are running - Tenants that are Activated are STARTED or are STARTING - Calls can be made on platform APIs
      STARTING
      The Platform is transitioning from state STOPPED to state STARTED - Tenants are still STOPPED ( will be started once the Platform is STARTED) - No calls can be made on APIs
      STOPPED
      The Platform is stopped: - Services are stopped - All Tenants are also STOPPED - No call to APIs can be made (except to login and start platform)
      STOPPING
      The Platform is transitioning from state STARTED to state STOPPED - Tenants are STOPPED or STOPPING - No calls can be made on APIs

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • STARTED

        public static final PlatformState STARTED
        The Platform is started: - Services are running - Tenants that are Activated are STARTED or are STARTING - Calls can be made on platform APIs

      • STARTING

        public static final PlatformState STARTING
        The Platform is transitioning from state STOPPED to state STARTED - Tenants are still STOPPED ( will be started once the Platform is STARTED) - No calls can be made on APIs

      • STOPPED

        public static final PlatformState STOPPED
        The Platform is stopped: - Services are stopped - All Tenants are also STOPPED - No call to APIs can be made (except to login and start platform)

      • STOPPING

        public static final PlatformState STOPPING
        The Platform is transitioning from state STARTED to state STOPPED - Tenants are STOPPED or STOPPING - No calls can be made on APIs

    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
